title: 5 Tips for Minecraft Plugin Development
excerpt: Learn essential tips for building better Minecraft plugins with Spigot/Paper API.
content:
After years of developing Minecraft plugins, here are my top 5 tips:

  1. Use async tasks - Never block the main thread
  2. Cache frequently accessed data - Reduce database calls
  3. Follow naming conventions - Keep code readable
  4. Test on multiple versions - Ensure compatibility
  5. Use events wisely - Don't over-register listeners
